com.github.maxstupo.flatengine.hgui

Class GuiContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.maxstupo.flatengine.hgui.AbstractNode
      • com.github.maxstupo.flatengine.hgui.GuiContainer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GuiButton, GuiImage, GuiItemContainer, GuiLabel, GuiList, GuiProgressBar, GuiSlider, GuiWindow

    public class GuiContainer
extends AbstractNode
    This GUI node represents a basic container allowing for a background and outline color.
    Author:
    Maxstupo
